Identity.History: Fado was a very talented musician and well loved violinist among the Kokiri. He was a pacifist and refused to attack anything living, an ideology he had great difficulty in upholding. His music seemed to have an almost magical power about it; he was quite able to domesticate feral beasts and monsters by playing the right tune.
